results.name: A007318 * (A097806 + A133080 - I), I = Identity matrix.
formula: A007318 * (A097806 + A133080 - I), I = Identity matrix. Binomial transform of an infinite lower triangular matrix with (1,1,1,...) in the main diagonal and (2,1,2,1,2,...) in the subdiagonal; and the rest zeros.
